title.label: Great game, but I noticed a SIGNIFICANT problem

content.label: I have been on and off with this game and don‚Äôt get me wrong it‚Äôs addicting, but I have one issue. The damage points for example ‚Äúinterrogation‚Äù is supposed to give damage of 2-3 to witnesses and etc..but instead it would give me a damage effect of 1 on occasions.. that is an issue within my gameplay since that is not what is listed to give for damage. If we can find ways to rectify issues like this my experience would be greatly improved. Also adding some more interesting comedy to dialogue as well.

i spent hours playing this game years ago but over time the developers stopped updating it. i‚Äôve been looking for ways to play games that haven‚Äôt been updated for a long time but i could never figure it out. the only reason i was looking for that‚Äôs was to play this game but they finally updated it for the newer softfware! this is by far the best lawyer/ attorney game i‚Äôve ever played. the voice acting is incredible, the animation is unique and stylish, the game mechanics are pretty realistic, and it has a plethora of content for you to explore. if you have an interest in strategy games or law then i highly recommend playing this game!

This game is one that I would certainly buy again. It offered plenty of entertainment while still requiring me to use my brain. My only beef is that there isn‚Äôt more! How about a season 2?

I spent hours on this game!  The case stories don‚Äôt change with difficulty level, only the strategy.  

How do we earn all the awards?  Once you solve all the cases, we can‚Äôt purchase any more upgrades and therefore don‚Äôt collect any more items, when clearly there are over 20 slots to collect them.  The most I‚Äôve been offered are 3. 

So I‚Äôm bored now.  It was a great $4.99 spent for Sunday evening entertainment!  But now it‚Äôs Tuesday and I‚Äôve played the Normal and Easy mode, onto the Hard mode but I‚Äôve lost interest bc I can see that the story and upgrades are the same and no matter what I won‚Äôt get all of the items.
